scripts.ios:pod-reset: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install
scripts.ios:clean: cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && npm run ios:pod-reset
scripts.ios:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.ios:dev-release: npm run ios:clean && npm run setDevelopment && react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "development"
scripts.ios:staging-release: npm run ios:clean && npm run setStaging && react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "staging"
scripts.ios:prod-release: npm run ios:clean && npm run ios:bundle:assets && npm run setProduction && react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "production"
scripts.aos:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.aos:remove:assets: rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw
scripts.aos:DD-apk: npm run setDevelopment && npm run aos:clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:DR-apk: npm run setDevelopment && npm run aos:clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:SD-apk: npm run setStaging && npm run aos:clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:SR-apk: npm run setStaging && npm run aos:clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:PD-apk: npm run setProduction && npm run aos:clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:PR-apk: npm run setProduction && npm run aos:clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:PR-Bundle: npm run setProduction && npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:dev-apk: npm run aos:DD-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:dev:release-apk: npm run aos:DR-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:staging-apk: npm run aos:SD-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:staging:release-apk: npm run aos:SR-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:prod-apk: npm run aos:PD-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:prod:release-apk: npm run aos:PR-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:bundle: npm run aos:PR-Bundle && npm run open-bundle
